scripts.vercel-build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --hide-modules && copy index.html dist\ && copy dist\build.js . && copy dist\style.css . && copy dist\favicon.png . && copy dist\img_logo.png . && copy dist\logo_small.png . && copy dist\promo*.jpg . && copy dist\promo*.png . && copy dist\*.png . && copy dist\*.gif . && copy dist\*.svg . && xcopy dist\img .\img /E /I /Y && xcopy dist\fonts .\fonts /E /I /Y && xcopy dist\assets .\assets /E /I /Y && xcopy dist\new .\new /E /I /Y && echo Production build completed
scripts.debug-build: npm run vercel-build && echo === DEBUG INFO === && echo Verificando archivos en dist: && dir dist\index.html && dir dist\build.js && dir dist\style.css && echo === FIN DEBUG ===
scripts.test-vercel: npm run vercel-build && echo === VERCEL TEST === && echo Estructura de archivos en dist: && dir dist && echo === Archivos principales: && dir dist\index.html && dir dist\build.js && dir dist\style.css && echo === Verificando rutas SPA: && echo index.html existe en dist: && if exist dist\index.html (echo SI) else (echo NO) && echo === FIN TEST ===
